changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE student.Qualification ALTER COLUMN [Subject] varchar(50)
ALTER TABLE student.Student ALTER COLUMN [Nationality] varchar(40)

changeSet.author: aali
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE payment.InvoicePayment ALTER COLUMN PaymentDate date NULL

changeSet.author: aali
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE timetable.SubjectAttendance ALTER COLUMN TeacherId int NULL

changeSet.author: aali
changeSet.sql:
declare @UserId int
SELECT TOP 1 @UserId = Id from [user].[user]
INSERT timetable.TuitionCentre SELECT '01','', @UserId,@UserId, GetDate(), GetDate() UNION ALL SELECT '02','', @UserId,@UserId, GetDate(), GetDate()
DELETE FROM teacher.Teacher where FirstName in ('Haider' ,'Yasmin' ,'Shaira')
INSERT INTO teacher.Teacher SELECT 'Yaseen', '',null,null, @UserId, @UserId,GETDATE(), GETDATE() UNION ALL SELECT 'Rafi', '',null,null, @UserId, @UserId,GETDATE(), GETDATE() UNION ALL SELECT 'Sofia', '',null,null, @UserId, @UserId,GETDATE(), GETDATE()

changeSet.author: aali
changeSet.sql: UPDATE [timetable].[DaysOfWeek] SET ModifiedDate = GETDATE() where Description = 'Sunday'
